item.title: Reasons to use R in the public sector number 1: Replicability
item.description: Start here As public sector workers who do stuff with data we frequently find our bosses saying “Hey, could you make a plot of these data”. We say, “Sure!” and then we typically: Open the data in Excel Cut out irrelevant bits and move stuff around so that it makes sense Plot it This works pretty well and we’ve all gotten pretty good at it. But there are some problems beneath the surface that make our lives less fun and makes our work less useful.
